backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining all backend types (Employee, WorkDay, PayrollRecord, etc.) and exposing CRUD endpoints for employee management, payroll, payments, leave, and access control using OrderedMap collections.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking the frontend data-fetching hooks fix (useQueries.ts, EmployeesPage, PaymentsPage) to its test requirement REQ-3 with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Auto-generated JSON summary file describing the purpose and key changes of each frontend source file in the project.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML entry point that mounts the React app into a div#root and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/index.ts: Minimal file containing a single Greek-language JSX heading element for the Employees page title.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up QueryClient (staleTime:0), ThemeProvider, and tab-based routing across seven pages including the DataRecoveryPage.
frontend/src/components/BulkEntryTable.t: Scrollable table component for bulk monthly work-hour entry per employee and day, with inline editing and auto-save on blur or leave toggle.
frontend/src/components/BulkLeaveDayDial: Dialog for recording a leave day for all employees at once by selecting a single date and calling the bulk leave mutation.
frontend/src/components/BulkMonthlyBankS: Inline or dialog component that renders a table of employees with input fields for their monthly bank salary amounts and saves them all in bulk.
frontend/src/components/BulkPaymentEntry: A table component for bulk entry of employee cash and bank payments for a selected month/year, with save functionality using the useAddPaymentsBulk hook.
frontend/src/components/DailyBulkEntryTa: A table component for bulk entry of daily work hours (normal, overtime, leave) for all employees on a selected date, saving via useSetWorkDaysBulk.
frontend/src/components/EmployeeCard.tsx: A card component displaying an employee's key details (name, type, salary, leave) with edit, delete, and folder-view action buttons.
frontend/src/components/EmployeeDialog.t: A dialog form component for adding or editing an employee, handling both monthly and hourly types with validation and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/EmployeeFolderVi: A read-only dialog that displays a detailed employee profile including salary, leave, and contact information, with an edit shortcut button.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: A simple footer component displaying the current year, app copyright, and a branded link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive navigation header with desktop and mobile menus, page navigation via callback props, and a dark/light theme toggle.
frontend/src/components/LeaveDayDialog.t: Dialog for recording a leave day for a selected employee on a chosen date, using the toggleLeaveDay mutation.
Dialog that lists all recorded leave days for a specific employee in descending order and allows deleting individual entries.
frontend/src/components/MonthlyBankSalar: View that displays monthly bank salary records grouped by employee for the current month/year, with per-entry delete support.
Dialog for adding a new monthly bank salary entry by selecting an employee, month, year, and amount.
Dialog for editing an existing monthly bank salary record's month, year, and amount, pre-populated from the provided salary object.
A card component that allows setting or updating a specific employee's monthly bank salary amount for a given month and year, with save functionality and current amount display.
frontend/src/components/PaymentEditDialo: A dialog form component for creating or editing employee payment records, supporting cash and bank payment fields, month/year selection, and payment date.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: An empty/placeholder component file for a profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/UnauthorizedAcce: An empty/placeholder component file for an unauthorized access screen.
frontend/src/components/WorkDayDialog.ts: A dialog component for recording an employee's work day, allowing input of normal hours, overtime hours, and leave status for a specific date.
frontend/src/docs/employee-calendar-sync: Documentation describing the bidirectional React Query cache invalidation strategy between individual and bulk work hour entry modes, ensuring both views stay synchronized without manual refresh.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using the current Internet Identity, and invalidates all dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, managing AuthClient creation, login, logout, and identity persistence with status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for payroll data and provides React Query hooks (useQuery/useMutation) for CRUD operations on employees, work days, payments, leave records, and related entities, with localStorage helpers for local persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that sets up Tailwind CSS, defines CSS custom properties for light/dark theme tokens (colors, radius, sidebar, charts), and adds enhanced calendar component styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider for React Query and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/CalendarPage.tsx: Page component for work-hour entry that provides month/year selectors and two tabs: monthly bulk entry (BulkEntryTable) and daily bulk entry (DailyBulkEntryTable).
frontend/src/pages/DataRecoveryPage.tsx: Page for exporting and importing all app localStorage data as a JSON backup file, with a summary view of stored keys and import/export status feedback.
frontend/src/pages/EmployeesPage.tsx: Page that lists employees with search, add/edit/delete actions, and a folder view, using useGetEmployees and useDeleteEmployee hooks with loading skeletons and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/LeavePage.tsx: Page for managing employee leave that displays per-employee leave balance cards with filtering, and supports adding single or bulk leave days via dialog components.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page component (content truncated/empty in provided source).
frontend/src/pages/MonthlyBankSalariesPa: Page for managing monthly bank salaries with month/year selectors and three tabs: bulk entry, individual per-employee entry, and a view tab.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentsPage.tsx: Page for managing employee payments with tabs for bulk entry and a monthly view showing cash/bank payment totals per employee, plus a dialog for adding new payments.
frontend/src/pages/PayrollPage.tsx: Payroll summary page showing monthly salary totals (overall, cash, bank) and per-employee payroll cards with a month/year selector.
frontend/src/types.ts: TypeScript interface definitions for all core domain models: Employee, WorkDay, PayrollRecord, LeaveRecord, PayrollBalance, PaymentRecord, MonthlyBankSalary, ChangeHistoryEntry, and PayrollData.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with dark mode, custom OKLCH-based color tokens, border radius, box shadow, accordion keyframes, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing the HR/payroll app, known data-loss issue between versions, pending backend migration tasks (AR-1, AR-2), and a completed frontend data-fetching fix feature.
